%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% Textclass specific LaTeX commands.
\newlength{\lyxlabelwidth}      % auxiliary length 

\@ifundefined{date}{}{\date{}}
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% User specified LaTeX commands.
% Definitions, theorems, remarks
\newtheorem{definition}{Definition}[chapter]
\newtheorem{theorem}{Theorem}[chapter]
\newtheorem{proposition}{Proposition}[chapter]
\newtheorem{remark}{Remark}[chapter]

% Examples
\newcounter{example}[chapter]
\newcommand{\example}{\medskip{}\noindent\refstepcounter{example}{\bf Example \thechapter.\arabic{example} }}
\renewcommand{\theexample}{\thechapter.\arabic{example}}

% Define proof environment
\newenvironment{proof}{\noindent\textbf{Proof: }}{$\hfill\blacksquare$}

\usepackage[nocompress]{cite}
\usepackage{algpseudocode}

\usepackage[font={footnotesize}]{caption}

% Equation reference
\usepackage{refstyle}
\newref{eq}{refcmd={\textup{\tagform@{\ref{#1}}}}}

% Brackets upright
\def\citeleft{\begingroup\rm[}
\def\citeright{]\endgroup}

% MATLAB syntax highlighting
\usepackage{matlab-prettifier}

% New color definition for listings
\definecolor{light-gray}{gray}{0.975}

% Nomenclature
\renewcommand\nomname{List of Abbreviations}
\def\nompreamble{\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{\nomname}}
\renewcommand{\nomlabel}[1]{{\bf #1}}

% Suppress title generation
\renewcommand\maketitle{}

% Title page margin adjustment
\usepackage{changepage}

% Remove empty page numbers
\usepackage{emptypage}

% Clear to left page
\newcommand*\cleartoleftpage{%
  \clearpage
  \ifodd\value{page}\hbox{}\newpage\fi
}

% Epigraph
\usepackage{epigraph} % Epigraph settings
\setlength{\epigraphwidth}{.42\textwidth}
\setlength{\epigraphrule}{0pt}
\setlength{\beforeepigraphskip}{1em}
\setlength{\afterepigraphskip}{1em}

\makeatother

\usepackage{listings}
\lstset{backgroundcolor={\color{light-gray}},
frame=tb,
framerule=0pt,
emph={oustapid,doustafod,d2sos,dcgain,margin,fotf,fsparam,fid,pfid,fidata,fpid_optimize,fpopt,fracpid,logspace,frac_rcl,zpk,prefnum,engnum,zscale,iopid_tune},
emphstyle={\color{blue}}}
\addto\captionsenglish{%
	\def\eqdeclaration#1{, see equation\nobreakspace(#1)}%
	\def\pagedeclaration#1{, page\nobreakspace#1}%
	\def\nomname{Nomenclature}%
}
\addto\captionsestonian{%
	\def\eqdeclaration#1{, see equation\nobreakspace(#1)}%
	\def\pagedeclaration#1{, page\nobreakspace#1}%
	\def\nomname{Nomenclature}%
}
\def\eqdeclaration#1{, see equation\nobreakspace(#1)}
\def\pagedeclaration#1{, page\nobreakspace#1}
\def\nomname{Nomenclature}

\item \label{enu:P2}J. Doe, W. Ever, \textquotedbl Design of a really
cool thing,\textquotedbl{} in Proc. of the 2013 Jmerican Control Conference
(JCC), Bashington DC, USJ, June 2013, pp. 9000--9003.
\item \label{enu:P3}J. Doe, M. Supp, \textquotedbl Efficient implementations
of things,\textquotedbl{} in Proc. of the 14th International Control
Conference (ICC), 2014, pp. 907--910.
\end{enumerate}

by the author of the thesis under the supervision of Dr. Who Ever
and Dr. Mei Supp.

lies in ...
